website_summaries.verdict: This set offers many styling choices at a good value for its cost.
pros: Users like that this set comes with several curling levels as well as a flat iron so it's easy to change up your look to get curls or beachy waves
It also gets high praise for creating long-lasting curls and being good quality for the cost
cons: A few felt it was hard to change the barrels, and occasionally users received a defective product

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought this product twice and love it!! It heats fast, great temperature although its burn my arm a couple times lol besides that ive never had a problem with it it comes with a 2 year warranty! Its my 2nd time buying it and i recomend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pink set and I love it. My hair doesn't curl what's so ever with any curler and this thing works. My hair seriously stays curled till the next day lol. Also I say curl but I actually use it to achieve the heavy beach wave. Super easy to use and I love that it has multiple tips to changes out. I haven't tried them all but I'm sure they're all good. Def worth the price. I would recommends for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Curls great! Lasts days!
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm loving this set of hot irons. The straightener I haven't tried as I like the one I already have but these curling wand extensions are incredible. I've tried all but the largest non-tapered one (yet) and I can't believe how well it curls my hair. I have somewhat resistant hair (pin straight and drab by nature) but this created gorgeous curls that lasted for days! I was impressed. Now to win the Lottery so I can hire someone to curl my hair once or twice a week with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves hers that she got as a Christmas present!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Houck

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product. The wands are perfect for all kinds of styling. And the curls stay without using much chemical products. The price is amazing!!!! Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshii

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Very good set for this price. I just wish i knew they came in more then just pink before i bought them. But so far i love it!
customer_reviews.author: Leunia

customer_reviews.title: The flat iron is good,the chell could have been thicker gets hot to the point of melting!And the wands dont get hot enough!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty set, but pretty doesn't cut it!I give it 2 stars because the flat iron is theee bomb!But the wands don't get hot enough at all! It's a complete strain to get it to curl!Do not buy this set!Its not worth it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Qawiyyia NIEMA Clay

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product
customer_reviews.text: This delux professional curling iron set works great! there are 8 interchangeable pieces that I have tried over the last week and I am super impressed! the curls HOLD! the straightener itself is the only thing that could use a boost on heat but if my hair is completely dry it only takes a few extra minutes to get a super smooth look!
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Great Products and Price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for a while now and works perfectly. All the barrel sizes are great and heat up quickly. Recommend buying the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase, it's not a Marquee!!!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in the incorrect box and the flat iron looked used and dirty.
customer_reviews.author: maria g ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This is not the brand it is a generic version. It works but my curls never hold. The straightener pulls my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Batchelor

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this my husband bought it for me as one of my Christmas gifts i almost cried when i seen it it heats up fast have different sizes for different styls love it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: justin g.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely recommend this product its great and very easy to use. Has heat protecting glove which is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Andrea A.

customer_reviews.title: Is it worth it?
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the absolute best quality but it honestly gets the job done. If you want the best and most efficient type of straightener then I’d suggest a titanium plated one.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great price for nice curling set
customer_reviews.text: Makes nice curls. It is a little hard to change the rods at first but once figured out it gets easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can finally have a curl in my hair that actually last.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Looks very high end and works great! Heats up quickly and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Gretta

customer_reviews.title: think she will love it. Looks to be a very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 13 year old niece for Christmas, think she will love it. Looks to be a very nice set. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: jtrafton

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work. When I am wanted to return it I was told I had to spend my own money to send their broken irons back. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I do not know much about this things but I bought this for my wife and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sevi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Recommend! Cheap Products Don’t Work Well!
customer_reviews.text: Curling iron doesn’t get all the way hot which causes it not to curl same as for the flat iron I don’t know if this is a technical issue or products or not as good but I do regret this purchase and wouldn’t recommend it. Also the straightening brush does not do as well as I thought it would with straightening hair. I recommend paying an expensive price for these type of products or else money will be waisted and you will be extremely dissatisfied as I currently am.
customer_reviews.author: sierra brooks

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you don’t get a fake.
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard for me to review the actual thing since I received a Knock off and returned it but I wanted to make others aware of this possibility. If your styling wand doesn’t have the marquee name on it and the box has a slip cover with the marquee name (over a white box) instead of it being on the actual box and the box being black, then you got a fake version. I attempted one curl which fell out immediately and then I noticed it was fake and was missing the logo on the iron.
customer_reviews.author: K. Harkness

customer_reviews.title: Great set would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price haven't used the flat iron yet but the rod works nice. The best part about the set is it's very versatile to make different size curls or waves or to just straighten. In the picture it shows it in color pink but the one I got was purple (like a light purple/lavender color) but for me that was no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! We are very thankful for the glove as well as she has been learning to use the wand. Great set.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley C.

customer_reviews.title: Loved so much they're borrowed all the time.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got one of these sets a few months ago, and absolutely loves it. My wife kept borrowing it, so I finally got her a set of her own! She really likes them as well.
customer_reviews.author: JD Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. High quality and literally half of this bi g label prices. Thx
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Flat iron wouldn't stay on. I Didn't attempt to use the curling wand.
customer_reviews.author: nancy arias

customer_reviews.title: Great Shopping Experience
customer_reviews.text: They are just so beautiful and came a way too earlier than I expected! I would completely recommend it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can probably write a better review after Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I can probably write a better review after Christmas. I bought this for my Granddaughter. I am hopin she will like it
customer_reviews.author: Sherry D.

product_meta.title: Deluxe Professional Beauty 8 Piece Interchangeable Flat and Curling Iron Set - Instant Hair Straightener, Professionally Curl Your Hair
product_meta.description:
MarQuee Beauty Professional Salon Ceramic Hair Straightener:

★ Curling iron base
★ 19mm clip-in curling barrel
★ 25mm clip-in curling barrel
★ 33mm clip-in curling barrel
★ Heat-resistant thermal styling glove

Benefits:

These two basic styling tools open up a world of hairstyle options. The straightener turns unruly frizz and waves into sleek, straight strands, and the curling wand can create tight ringlets, loose curls, or bed-head waves with its interchangeable barrels.

How It Works:

Ceramic is a smooth material that glides effortlessly through hair without damaging snags or pulls. And when it gets hot, it releases a flood of negative ions. Those ions form a protective barrier around each hair’s cuticle, sealing in moisture and shine (and color if your hair is dyed), and preventing humidity from entering if it doesn’t know the secret handshake.

Flat Iron Specifics:

❤ 100% ceramic plates
❤ Floating plates minimize damage
❤ Heats up within seconds
❤ Even heat distribution means no damaging hot spots
❤ Heat range: 175ºF–450ºF
❤ 9ft., 360º swivel cord Curling Iron Specifics
❤ Curling wand with interchangeable barrels for a variety of looks
❤ Tourmaline-infused ceramic barrels create even more negative ions
❤ Clip less design makes the most natural-looking curls and waves
❤ On/off switch
❤ LED light indicators
feature_bullets: Its time to fight your frizz, with our high quality flat iron and our instant curling wand!
The flat iron’s pure ceramic plates are attached to a flexible membrane that swivels with users’ movements, which keeps the iron from catching and breaking hair while styling.
Flat iron with 100% solid floating ceramic plates; Flexible membrane avoids hair breakage.
Nano-silver, negative ion, and far infrared technology; Even heat distribution.
Curling wand with five interchangeable barrels infused with tourmaline; Clipless design create tight curls and loose waves.
